Articles.Content:
On  the KER Flight Engineer readout which can be displayed while in flight, there are lines separating some of the readings from others, for example Apoapsis and Periapsis height and time to are followed by a line which helps make them standout from all the other data in the Orbital section.

I've added a few more settings to the section and would like to have lines between some of them too, but I can't figure out how to add them, could anyone please explain how to do this?

Thanks all.
It's just an entry in the list. Like adding a dv line. I think it's in general.
Yes... thank you!  I would never have found that, your help was very much appreciated!
